definition: guaranteed to cure all diseases
surname Bao
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research
hundred/numerous/all kinds of
surname Bai
illness/CL:場|场[chang2]/disease/to fall ill/defect

sentences.english: Any medical equipment are not a panacea, including high potential into account.
sentences.chinese: 任何醫療器械都不可能包治百病，包括高電位在內。

sentences.english: I really don't think there is one way to do it.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲沒有哪種方法可以包治百病。

sentences.english: Mr. Kennedy, the Indiana University expert, said he was less certain that endless growth is such a panacea.
sentences.chinese: 肯尼迪表示，無休止的經濟增長並不能包治百病。

sentences.english: The tonic is believed to be an all-purpose cure for everything from asthma to liver disease.
sentences.chinese: 這種補酒據說包治百病，包括哮喘和肝病。

sentences.english: Even the best-laid plans will not be a miracle cure.
sentences.chinese: 即使是最完善的計劃也不會是包治百病的靈丹妙藥。

definition: effective cure, miracle medicine (idiom); fig. wonder-cure for all problems/panacea/elixir
lit. the disease is cured the moment the medicine is taken (idiom)/fig. (of a medical treatment) to give instant results/(of a solution or method) highly effective
effective medicine for a specific condition/highly effective medicine
pseudoscience
quack/charlatan/itinerant doctor and swindler
good medicine/panacea/fig. a good solution/a good remedy (e.g. to a social problem)
swindler/itinerant con-man
omnipotent/all-purpose/universal
(of medicine) to use specifically for the treatment of
indigo woad root/root of Isatis tinctoria (used in TCM)
to make life longer/to promise longevity/(this product will) extend your life
lit. to turn to any doctor one can find when critically ill (idiom); fig. to try anyone or anything in a crisis
every medicine has its side effect
tonic
to rise from the dead (idiom); fig. an unexpected recovery
(traditional) Chinese medicine/CL:服[fu4],種|种[zhong3]
